title: Bard the anime man
body: Bard is trash, this proves that league isn't an anime because if league was an anime he would be the op protagonist, gg.

replies.body: Okay. He doesn't remind me of any anime.. he reminds me of the PS3 game Journey especially with the bells/chime sounds, if anyone here has played that.
He is actually a homage to Miyazaki's anime films such as My Neighbour Totoro, Princess Mononoke and Spirited Away if I am not wrong.

The mysterious type who doesn't care, who is fundamentally OP in power, maybe being immortal while following some sort of order is never the most known or shown character in pretty much any anime I know really.

Since again, he doesn't care so he won't parade his power nor fight for some personal gains. Unless they are made to care for something/someone by certain incident or whatever as the story progresses, otherwise OP characters to my knowledge is not really shown to be actively dominating inside any anime.
